p: In-depth interviews were conducted with 14 institutional stakeholders including 2 public health representatives from the Cameroon Health Ministry, 3 international experts and researchers, a total of 7 members of international and local NGO, 1 stakeholder from the media and 1 stakeholder from a pharmaceutical company. We also interviewed 14 HCP as follows: 2 nurses, 6 gastroenterologists, 3 infectious disease specialists, 1 haematologist, 1 general practitioner and 1 social worker ( table 2).
